string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Wake Shantanu up if you haven\'t already and tell him how much you adore him and love him!
Make Shantanu and brush and kiss him SO tightly that it makes him want to gasp for air!
Make AWESOME breakfast! Take Shantanu\'s help if he\'s awake. If he\'s sleeping you did step 1 incorrectly!
Tell Shantanu how good looking he is and tell him how much you love him!
Take and intimate shower with Shantanu and GOOF around later!
Take Shantanu to one of he resteraunts you always wanted to go to!
Watch A Super Romantic Movie Together Ya!
Get another massage if you aren\'t satisfied with yesterdays massage. Shantanu can\'t say no!
Do everything and anything you want! After all it\s Vanshika\'s Day!
Just know that even after today is over, Shantanu will keep loving you FOREVER and his love for you will grow by every passing moment, for as long as you live and die.
